subject: Athletics and Sports
Hockey, Ice
Baseball
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Fans have jeered and booed more than one Yankee on the field in the past, and scorching one of your own has been a phenomenon well-documented in other sports.
snippet: Fans have jeered and booed more than one Yankee on the field in the past, and scorching one of your own has been a phenomenon well-documented in other sports.
